name: granny shawl - version 1
notes:

a beautiful and simple **shawl** crocheted in the well-known “granny” pattern which is a super easy technique and thus perfect for beginners or as a relaxing project while watching tv :-)

the shawl is worked in cotton kings sultan which is a gorgeous “cake-yarn” in 100% cotton. the yarn consists of 4 thin and untwined strands with beautiful, slow color transitions which makes it perfect for this project. happy crocheting!
